metadata.title: TCDesignerProducts Student Council Blue Glitter Award Pin, Pack of 12
features: Includes 12 Student Council Blue Glitter Award Lapel Pins, same style and design
Award lapel pin measures 1" and features a bright blue glitter background, the words Student Council in gold on black ribbons and a white scroll, green laurel leaves and a brown gavel center design
Award lapel pins come with a secure back for easy attachment to backpacks, tote bags, clothing and jackets
Enjoy budget-friendly savings with multiple quantity product pricing
Students of all ages will enjoy being recognized and rewarded with high-quality Award Lapel Pins
description: Put a smile on every Student Council member's face when they are presented with this beautiful Student Council Blue Glitter Award Lapel Pin. The 1" high-quality gold-edge award pin features a bright blue glitter background, the words Student Council in gold on black ribbons and a white scroll, green laurel leaves and a brown gavel center design. Each award lapel pin comes with a secure back for easy attachment to backpacks, tote bags, clothing and jackets. Package includes12 pins, same style and design.
